item.title: Report X-2025021170
item.description:
Report X-2025021170

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-28T00:58:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR FULLY REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING CONTENTS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A FIVE GALLON CAPACITY INNER CONTAINER HOLDING 8.64 L OF UN1197 EXTRACTS LIQUID, PG II, CLASS 3. THE INNER BLUE CONTAINER APPEARS CRUSHED FROM THE TOP AND WAS LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THE OUTER BOX IS MARKED OVERPACK AND APPEARS CRUSHED AT THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX. APPROXIMATELY ONE GALLON DANGEROUS GOODS LEAKED FROM THE PACKAGE. THE PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE SHIPPER ORIGIN FACILITY IN CALIFORNIA.
